title: Wages and GDP in England 1500-2000, political

content.prompt: Which of the following political developments in Britain was most directly a response to the labor conditions suggested by the data for 1850?

choices.label: British Conservatives’ shift from isolationism to support of imperial expansion
British Liberals’ shift from laissez-faire to interventionist economic and social policies
British industrialists’ shift from support of protectionism to support of free trade
British socialists’ success in advancing revolutionary Marxist principles

topic.text: 6.2: The Spread of Industry Throughout Europe

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
